Ardent Alacrity.name: Ardent Alacrity
Ardent Alacrity.flavor: As you take a hit, your emotional energy inspires your allies.
Ardent Alacrity.trigger: You are bloodied by an attack
Ardent Alacrity.effect: Each target can use a free action either to shift 1 square or to move half his or her speed.

Ardent Surge.name: Ardent Surge
Ardent Surge.flavor: You send a surge of powerful emotion that revives a faltering ally.
Ardent Surge.effect:
The target can spend a healing surge and regain 1d6 additional hit points.
Level 6: 2d6 additional hit points.
Level 11: 3d6 additional hit points.
Level 16: 4d6 additional hit points.
Level 21: 5d6 additional hit points.
Level 26: 6d6 additional hit points.
Ardent Surge.mantleOfClarity: The target gains a +1 bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.
Ardent Surge.mantleOfElation: The target gains a +1 bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Ardent Surge.special: You can use this power twice per encounter, but only once per round. At 16th level, you can use this power three times per encounter, but only once per round.

Energizing Strike.name: Energizing Strike
Energizing Strike.flavor: The energy and emotion you put into your attack flows into your ally.
Energizing Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and you or one ally within 5 squares of you can spend a healing surge.

Focusing Strike.name: Focusing Strike
Focusing Strike.flavor: You attack your foe with calm and clarity of mind, extending that clarity to give a nearby ally a chance to clear a lingering effect.
Focusing Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and you and each ally within 5 squares of you can make a saving throw.

Psionic Shield.name: Psionic Shield
Psionic Shield.flavor: As you strike your foe, you motivate a nearby ally with a calm determination to defend himself or herself.
Psionic Shield.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and each ally within 5 squares of you gains a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

Implanted Suggestion.name: Implanted Suggestion
Implanted Suggestion.flavor: You compel your enemy to open itself to attack.
Implanted Suggestion.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
Implanted Suggestion.effect: The target is affected by your suggestion (save ends). Until the suggestion ends, whenever the target makes an attack, one ally adjacent to the target can make a melee basic attack against it as a free action after the target’s attack is resolved.

Wormhole Plunge.name: Wormhole Plunge
Wormhole Plunge.flavor: Your foe falls through a hole in space and appears some distance away from you.
Wormhole Plunge.effect:
You teleport the target a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier, and then one ally adjacent to the target can make a melee basic attack against it as a free action.
The attack creates a zone in the space that the target vacated. The zone lasts until the end of your next turn. Any creature that starts its turn within 3 squares of the zone is pulled 1 square toward it or into it. Once per round as a free action, you can teleport a creature within the zone 3 squares.

Dimension Swap.name: Dimension Swap
Dimension Swap.flavor: You fold the space between yourself and an ally so that you can switch positions.
Dimension Swap.effect: You teleport yourself and the target, swapping positions.

Mind over Matter.name: Mind over Matter
Mind over Matter.flavor: You convince an ally that the wounds he or she suffers are not as bad as they seem.
Mind over Matter.effect: The target gains temporary hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.

Distracting Strike.name: Distracting Strike
Distracting Strike.flavor: With a savage strike, you wrench your enemy’s attention from an ally.
Distracting Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and either you or an ally adjacent to the target marks it until the end of your next turn.
Distracting Strike.effect: The marked condition ends on allies adjacent to you, who can each shift 1 square as a free action.

Prescient Strike.name: Prescient Strike
Prescient Strike.flavor: You see the danger and let your weapon serve as warning to your comrade.
Prescient Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage. When the target attacks you or an ally adjacent to you during its next turn, you can make the following secondary attack against it as an immediate interrupt.
Prescient Strike.secondaryOnHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage. When the target attacks you or an ally you can see during its next turn, you can make the following secondary attack against it as an immediate interrupt, with a bonus to the secondary attack roll equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Enlightening Pulse.name: Enlightening Pulse
Enlightening Pulse.flavor: Clarity pulses out from your mind, creating an area that helps your allies free themselves from unfavorable circumstances.
Enlightening Pulse.effect: The attack creates a zone in a close burst 2. The zone lasts until the end of your next turn. When an ally damages an enemy that is within the zone, one ally within the zone can make a saving throw with a power bonus equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Fate Exchange.name: Fate Exchange
Fate Exchange.flavor: You bend space to let yourself and an ally exchange positions.
Fate Exchange.target: You and one ally in the burst
Fate Exchange.effect: The targets teleport, swapping positions, and can then each make a basic attack as a free action, with a +2 power bonus to the attack rolls. For each of these attacks that hits, you or one ally you can see can both spend a healing surge and make a saving throw. If both basic attacks miss, you regain the use of this power.

Evade Attack.name: Evade Attack
Evade Attack.flavor: When your friend steps into harm’s way, you whisk him or her to safety.
Evade Attack.trigger: An ally is hit by an opportunity attack
Evade Attack.effect: You teleport the target a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier.

Mend Wounds.name: Mend Wounds
Mend Wounds.flavor: You accelerate your friend’s natural healing ability so that his or her wounds close with amazing speed.
Mend Wounds.effect: The target regains hit points as if he or she had spent a healing surge.

Courageous Strike.name: Courageous Strike
Courageous Strike.flavor: You strike at your foe and fill your friend with courage, bolstering both of you against the foe’s attacks.
Courageous Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and one ally adjacent to the target can make a melee basic attack against it as an opportunity action.
Courageous Strike.keyword: This power gains the Zone keyword.
Courageous Strike.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. You and your allies gain a power bonus to AC equal to your Wisdom modifier while within the zone.

Mindlink Strike.name: Mindlink Strike
Mindlink Strike.flavor: Linking minds with an ally, you coordinate your efforts to confound your foe.
Mindlink Strike.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Mindlink Strike.effect: As above, and the ally gains a +3 power bonus to the damage roll if he or she is marking the target.
Mindlink Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and one ally adjacent to the target can make a melee basic attack against it as an opportunity action.

Dulled Reflexes.name: Dulled Reflexes
Dulled Reflexes.flavor: Your foe moves slower and slower until it can’t move, and its slowness infects its allies.
Dulled Reflexes.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target takes a –2 penalty to speed (save ends). Until the penalty ends, it worsens by 2 whenever the target attacks. When the target’s speed reaches 0 in this way, the penalty ends, but the target is restrained and stunned (save ends both).
Dulled Reflexes.effect: Until the end of the encounter, any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to the target is slowed (save ends).

Feast of Plenty.name: Feast of Plenty
Feast of Plenty.flavor: You wrap your foe in a psionic net that leaches power from it for your allies.
Feast of Plenty.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever the target takes damage, you and each ally adjacent to you gain temporary hit points equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

From the Brink.name: From the Brink
From the Brink.flavor: Your friend hovers near death. You touch his or her mind, and your friend awakens with a start.
From the Brink.effect: The target regains hit points as if he or she had spent a healing surge. If the target is dying, he or she regains additional hit points equal to 2d10 + your Charisma modifier. In addition, the target can stand up as a free action.

Incite Bravery.name: Incite Bravery
Incite Bravery.flavor: Your allies find new courage with your support.
Incite Bravery.target: You and each ally in the burst
Incite Bravery.effect: Until the end of your next turn, each target gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and a +2 power bonus to saving throws against fear effects.

Hope's Audacity.name: Hope's Audacity
Hope's Audacity.flavor: Your optimism and confidence are an inspiration to those around you.
Hope's Audacity.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage. Until the start of your next turn, allies within 5 squares of you can score a critical hit on a roll of 19–20.

Revelatory Strike.name: Revelatory Strike
Revelatory Strike.flavor: As you strike, you open your ally’s mind, allowing him or her to see ways to overcome various ills.
Revelatory Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage. The attack creates a zone in a close burst 2. The zone lasts until the end of your next turn. Any ally who starts his or her turn within the zone can either make a saving throw with a +2 power bonus or gain a power bonus to all defenses equal to your Wisdom modifier until the end of his or her next turn.
Revelatory Strike.keyword: This power gains the Zone keyword.

Imminent Demise.name: Imminent Demise
Imminent Demise.flavor: Your enemies face certain doom, and you force them to see it and despair.
Imminent Demise.effect: The attack creates a zone in a close burst 1. The zone lasts until the end of your next turn. Bloodied enemies that start their turn within the zone take 10 psychic damage.

Vigorous Offensive.name: Vigorous Offensive
Vigorous Offensive.flavor: As battle’s thrill overtakes you and you swing your weapon all around, your allies share in the same emotions.
Vigorous Offensive.target: One, two, three, or four creatures
Vigorous Offensive.effect: For each attack you make with this power, an ally within 5 squares of you gains temporary hit points equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

Bountiful Life.name: Bountiful Life
Bountiful Life.flavor: As your fortunes improve, so too do those of your allies.
Bountiful Life.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. Whenever you regain hit points, each ally within the zone gains temporary hit points equal to half the hit points you regained.

Re-Form Mind.name: Re-Form Mind
Re-Form Mind.flavor: You connect the target’s thoughts to awaken new talents.
Re-Form Mind.requirement: You must be taking a short rest.
Re-Form Mind.effect: The target gains training in a skill of your choice until you take an extended rest.

Diamond Defense Assault.name: Diamond Defense Assault
Diamond Defense Assault.flavor: The crystalline motes released by your attack shelter your allies and interfere with your enemies’ strikes.
Diamond Defense Assault.onHit: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square.
Diamond Defense Assault.keyword: This power gains the Zone keyword.
Diamond Defense Assault.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. While within the zone, allies gain a +4 bonus to all defenses against attacks from outside the zone, and enemies take a –2 penalty to attack rolls.

Temporal Strike.name: Temporal Strike
Temporal Strike.flavor: Time bends around your foe to protect your allies.
Temporal Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn. The attack creates a zone in a close burst 2. The zone lasts until the end of your next turn. While within the zone, you and your allies are insubstantial.

Deflecting Disk.name: Deflecting Disk
Deflecting Disk.flavor: Your attack manifests a shimmering field, which you can move to protect your allies.
Deflecting Disk.onHit: 4[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and you push the target 2 squares.
Deflecting Disk.effect: You conjure a shimmering disk of force in a square within 5 squares of you. Allies in the disk’s square or adjacent to it gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses. You can move the disk 3 squares as part of a move action. When an attack hits an ally adjacent to the disk, you can use an immediate interrupt to grant the ally a +2 bonus to all defenses against that attack. The disk lasts until the end of the encounter or until you use the immediate interrupt.

Shared Vigor.name: Shared Vigor
Shared Vigor.flavor: You create an expanse of glittering energy to reinvigorate your allies.
Shared Vigor.effect: The attack creates a zone in a close burst 2. The zone lasts until the end of the encounter. When any ally within the zone spends a healing surge, all other allies within the zone regain 1d10 hit points.

Insensate Mind.name: Insensate Mind
Insensate Mind.flavor: You influence the mind of your ally so that he or she doesn’t feel pain for a time.
Insensate Mind.effect: The target gains resistance to all damage equal to one-half your level until the end of your next turn.

Rapid Recovery.name: Rapid Recovery
Rapid Recovery.flavor: You channel positive thoughts to speed your allies’ recovery.
Rapid Recovery.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. When you move, the zone moves with you, remaining centered on you. Any ally who starts his or her turn within the zone regains 10 hit points.

Perception Shift.name: Perception Shift
Perception Shift.flavor: As you strike, you force your victim to attack where your allies are strongest.
Perception Shift.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Perception Shift.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier psychic damage. Whenever the target attacks before the end of your next turn, it attacks a defense of your choice.
Perception Shift.keyword: This power gains the Zone keyword.
Perception Shift.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. When any enemy attacks while within the zone, the enemy attacks a defense of your choice.

Revealing Strike.name: Revealing Strike
Revealing Strike.flavor: Your attack highlights the target’s weaknesses.
Revealing Strike.onHit: 4[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target takes a –3 penalty to all defenses until the end of your next turn. In addition, you and each ally adjacent to you gain blindsight 10 until the end of your next turn.

Corona of Battle.name: Corona of Battle
Corona of Battle.flavor: Your emotions emanate from you to instill new courage and prowess in your allies.
Corona of Battle.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. When you move, the zone moves with you, remaining centered on you. While within the zone, allies gain regeneration 5 and a +2 power bonus to attack rolls, and their attacks deal 1d10 extra damage.

Intellect Bomb.name: Intellect Bomb
Intellect Bomb.flavor: Your attack implants a psychic bomb in your foe’s mind.
Intellect Bomb.onHit: 3[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and you slide the primary target 1 square.
Intellect Bomb.effect: Before the end of the encounter, you can make the following secondary attack once, either when the primary target drops to 0 hit points or as a minor action. The secondary attack is a close burst 2 centered on the primary target.
Intellect Bomb.secondaryOnHit: 2d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the secondary target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Image of Doom.name: Image of Doom
Image of Doom.flavor: In the mind of your enemy, you become the image of its doom, and it quails before your attacks.
Image of Doom.effect: Until the end of the encounter, the target takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls and all defenses while it can see you, and you can slide it 1 square as a free action when it takes damage from any attack.

Violent Spark.name: Violent Spark
Violent Spark.flavor: Crimson light shines from your allies’ eyes as your comrades make a sudden barrage of attacks.
Violent Spark.effect: Each target can make an at-will attack as a free action, with a power bonus to the damage roll equal to your Wisdom modifier. If a target misses, he or she can make a saving throw.

Dismissive Strike.name: Dismissive Strike
Dismissive Strike.flavor: When your attack hits, you dismiss your enemy and leave it to face your friends.
Dismissive Strike.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Dismissive Strike.keyword: This power gains the Zone keyword.
Dismissive Strike.effect: The attack creates a zone in a close burst 1. The zone lasts until the end of your next turn. When any enemy enters the zone or starts its turn there, you can teleport that enemy 5 squares as a free action. Any ally who enters the zone or starts his or her turn there can teleport 5 squares as a free action.

Exhilarating Strike.name: Exhilarating Strike
Exhilarating Strike.flavor: You inspire your allies to strike, and success rewards them with recovery.
Exhilarating Strike.effect: Each target can use a free action either to make a basic attack or to charge, with a power bonus to the damage roll equal to your Wisdom modifier. If a target hits, he or she can make a saving throw.

Ardent Outrage.name: Ardent Outrage
Ardent Outrage.flavor: As you take a hit, your anger unbalances your foes.
Ardent Outrage.trigger: You are bloodied by an attack
Ardent Outrage.effect: Each target grants combat advantage until the start of your next turn.

Demoralizing Strike.name: Demoralizing Strike
Demoralizing Strike.flavor: The fury of your assault causes a surge of fear in your foe’s heart.
Demoralizing Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target takes a penalty to all defenses equal to 1 + your Constitution modifier until the end of your next turn.

Ire Strike.name: Ire Strike
Ire Strike.flavor: You feel anger rising within you, and you empower a nearby ally to strike.
Ire Strike.effect: One ally within 5 squares of you can use a free action to shift to a square adjacent to the target and then make a melee basic attack against it. If the attack hits, it deals 1d8 extra damage to the target, and the target has vulnerability to all damage equal to 1 + your Charisma modifier until the end of your next turn.

Adrenaline Strike.name: Adrenaline Strike
Adrenaline Strike.flavor: Your allies feel a rush of emotion with each blow they land.
Adrenaline Strike.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever you or any of your allies hits the target, the character who made the attack can shift 1 square as a free action.

Battleborn Acuity.name: Battleborn Acuity
Battleborn Acuity.flavor: You shine like a beacon, lighting the way to victory.
Battleborn Acuity.effect: Until the end of your next turn, your allies gain both a +1 power bonus to attack rolls and a power bonus to damage rolls equal to your Constitution modifier while they are adjacent to you.

Mental Turmoil.name: Mental Turmoil
Mental Turmoil.flavor: You transform your opponent’s frustration about its own mistakes into your allies’ elation.
Mental Turmoil.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target takes a penalty to attack rolls equal to your Wisdom modifier (save ends).
Mental Turmoil.onMiss: Half damage, and the target takes a penalty to attack rolls equal to half your Wisdom modifier (save ends).
Mental Turmoil.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever the target misses with a melee attack, you or one ally adjacent to you gains temporary hit points equal to 5 + one-half your level.

Bend Space.name: Bend Space
Bend Space.flavor: You close the distance between an ally and an enemy.
Bend Space.effect: Until the end of your next turn, the target’s reach increases by 1, and the target adds your Wisdom modifier to the range of his or her ranged powers.

Psionic Conduit.name: Psionic Conduit
Psionic Conduit.flavor: You lend psionic power to an ally in need.
Psionic Conduit.effect: You transfer 1 or 2 power points to the target.

Wellspring of Vigor.name: Wellspring of Vigor
Wellspring of Vigor.flavor: By shutting down his or her ability to feel pain, you ensure that your ally can keep going when others might falter.
Wellspring of Vigor.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever the target starts his or her turn and is not bloodied, he or she gains temporary hit points equal to 1 + your Constitution modifier.

Impatient Strike.name: Impatient Strike
Impatient Strike.flavor: You cannot contain yourself—you must close at once!
Impatient Strike.effect: Before the attack, you shift 1 square.
Impatient Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, allies gain a power bonus to damage rolls equal to your Constitution modifier while they are adjacent to you.

Unnerving Shove.name: Unnerving Shove
Unnerving Shove.flavor: You lash the enemy’s mind and body with your attack.
Unnerving Shove.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to 1 + your Constitution modifier. In addition, the target grants combat advantage to your allies adjacent to it at the end of the push.

Empowered Arsenal.name: Empowered Arsenal
Empowered Arsenal.flavor: Violet energy shimmers around you, lending psionic power to your allies’ attacks.
Empowered Arsenal.effect: The attack creates a zone in a close burst 1. The zone lasts until the end of your next turn. When you move, the zone moves with you, remaining centered on you. While within the zone, your allies gain a power bonus to damage rolls equal to your Constitution modifier, and their melee attacks ignore the insubstantial quality.

Persistent Veil.name: Persistent Veil
Persistent Veil.flavor: Whether or not your attack hits, your psionic assault makes your foe think you blinded it.
Persistent Veil.onHit: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is blinded (save ends).
Persistent Veil.aftereffect: All creatures have concealment against the target, and it takes a -5 penalty to Perception checks (save ends both).
Persistent Veil.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is blinded until the start of your next turn.

Battle Link.name: Battle Link
Battle Link.flavor: Your senses merge with your ally’s until you see things from all perspectives.
Battle Link.target: Two allies you can see or you and one ally you can see
Battle Link.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever the targets are within 5 squares of each other, neither grants combat advantage for being flanked unless both are flanked.

Body Adjustment.name: Body Adjustment
Body Adjustment.flavor: At your touch, your ally trembles with newfound energy.
Body Adjustment.effect: The target gains temporary hit points equal to 1d12 + your Charisma modifier.

Thought Shield.name: Thought Shield
Thought Shield.flavor: You focus your mind and construct a psionic shield to shelter you and your allies from harm.
Thought Shield.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. You and your allies gain both resist 3 to all damage and a +2 bonus to saving throws while within the zone.

Forward-Thinking Cut.name: Forward-Thinking Cut
Forward-Thinking Cut.flavor: You fling yourself at your enemy, and your allies attack more mightily in response.
Forward-Thinking Cut.onHit: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and each ally adjacent to you gains a +1 power bonus to attack rolls until the start of your next turn.
Forward-Thinking Cut.special: When charging, you can use this power unaugmented in place of a melee basic attack.
Forward-Thinking Cut.effect: One or two allies you can see can each charge creatures other than the target as a free action, with a power bonus to their damage rolls equal to your Constitution modifier.

Rewarding Strike.name: Rewarding Strike
Rewarding Strike.flavor: There is joy in victory, and those who follow your lead experience exhilaration.
Rewarding Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage. Allies who hit the target before the end of your next turn can spend a healing surge.

Unhinging Strike.name: Unhinging Strike
Unhinging Strike.flavor: A jolt of psionic power clouds your enemy’s senses so that the foe sees its cohorts as its enemies.
Unhinging Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target makes a melee basic attack as a free action against one or two creatures of your choice.

Agony Field.name: Agony Field
Agony Field.flavor: You strike your foe and let out a psychic shriek, which creates a pulsing field of pain.
Agony Field.onHit: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and ongoing 5 psychic damage (save ends).
Agony Field.effect: The attack creates a zone in a close burst 1. The zone lasts until the end of your next turn. When you move, the zone moves with you, remaining centered on you. Whenever you take damage from an attack, each enemy within the zone takes 5 psychic damage.

Feast of Despair.name: Feast of Despair
Feast of Despair.flavor: Your attack rattles your foe, and you and your allies draw energy from its despair.
Feast of Despair.effect: Until the end of the encounter, the target takes a -2 penalty to all defenses, and whenever it misses with an attack, you or an ally you can see regains 1 power point.

Passage of Swords.name: Passage of Swords
Passage of Swords.flavor: You fling your foe away. As it goes, your allies take advantage of its disorientation.
Passage of Swords.effect: You slide the target 5 squares. Each ally adjacent to the target during this slide can make a melee basic attack against it as a free action, with a power bonus to the damage roll equal to your Charisma modifier.

Reactive Resistance.name: Reactive Resistance
Reactive Resistance.flavor: You anticipate an attack and magically feed resilience to yourself or your friend.
Reactive Resistance.trigger: An attack damages you or an ally
Reactive Resistance.target: You or the ally in the burst
Reactive Resistance.effect: The damage the target takes from the triggering attack is reduced by an amount equal to your level.

Tower of Iron Will.name: Tower of Iron Will
Tower of Iron Will.flavor: You visualize a mighty tower, and in doing so you create a psionic bastion to protect your allies.
Tower of Iron Will.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. While within the zone, you and your allies gain resist 10 psychic, a +4 power bonus to Will, and a +2 power bonus to AC, Fortitude, and Reflex. In addition, any ally who starts his or her turn within the zone can make a saving throw against a dominating or stunning effect.

Confusing Strike.name: Confusing Strike
Confusing Strike.flavor: You flood your opponent’s thoughts with confusing images.
Confusing Strike.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Confusing Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Confusing Strike.keyword: This power gains the Zone keyword.
Confusing Strike.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. Enemies take a -2 penalty to attack rolls while within the zone.

Field of Alacrity.name: Field of Alacrity
Field of Alacrity.flavor: Your attack distracts the enemy, giving your allies an opening to maneuver.
Field of Alacrity.onHit: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage. One ally within 5 squares of you can take a move action as a free action.

Victorious Urging.name: Victorious Urging
Victorious Urging.flavor: You fill your foe with visions of impending doom and an ally with a dream of victory.
Victorious Urging.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square. Until the end of your next turn, you and your allies gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against the target and any enemies adjacent to it.

Extermination Urge.name: Extermination Urge
Extermination Urge.flavor: A savage strike against your opponent implants a terrible urge within it to seek out its end.
Extermination Urge.onHit: The target is dominated and gains vulnerability to all damage equal to your Wisdom modifier (save ends both).
Extermination Urge.onMiss: The target is dazed and gains vulnerability to all damage equal to half your Wisdom modifier (save ends both).

Mountainfall Strike.name: Mountainfall Strike
Mountainfall Strike.flavor: You smash your weapon into your enemy, imparting the feeling that it and all its companions have been buried alive.
Mountainfall Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends). Until the condition ends, any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to the target is immobilized until the start of that enemy’s next turn.
Mountainfall Strike.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed (save ends). Until the condition ends, any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to the target is slowed until the start of that enemy’s next turn.

Unchecked Aggression.name: Unchecked Aggression
Unchecked Aggression.flavor: Your anger bleeds out from you, unnerving your enemies and strengthening your allies.
Unchecked Aggression.effect: The attack creates a zone in a close burst 1. The zone lasts until the end of your next turn. While within the zone, allies gain a power bonus to damage rolls equal to your Constitution modifier, and enemies grant combat advantage.

Fortunate Recovery.name: Fortunate Recovery
Fortunate Recovery.flavor: You share your luck with your allies.
Fortunate Recovery.trigger: You succeed on a saving throw
Fortunate Recovery.effect: The next saving throw each target makes before the end of your next turn gains a bonus equal to your Constitution modifier.

Mental Rejuvenation.name: Mental Rejuvenation
Mental Rejuvenation.flavor: Your psionic magic allows one ally to ignore many wounds or several allies to ignore a few.
Mental Rejuvenation.target: You or one ally in the burst or you and each ally in the burst
Mental Rejuvenation.effect: If you target only one creature with this power, the target regains hit points as if he or she had spent two healing surges. If you target more than one creature, each target regains hit points as if he or she had spent a healing surge.

Uncanny Awareness.name: Uncanny Awareness
Uncanny Awareness.flavor: Sensing your enemies are about to strike, you urge your allies into position.
Uncanny Awareness.target: You and each ally in the burst
Uncanny Awareness.effect: Each target can move half his or her speed as a free action.

Illuminating Strike.name: Illuminating Strike
Illuminating Strike.flavor: Light bathes your foe as you strike and then settles on a nearby ally for protection.
Illuminating Strike.effect: If you hit at least one target, one ally within 5 squares of you gains resistance to all damage equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier until the start of your next turn.

Terrifying Deluge.name: Terrifying Deluge
Terrifying Deluge.flavor: You spear your enemy’s mind and body, so when the foe is next attacked, its mind blossoms in pain.
Terrifying Deluge.onHit: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square. When any ally hits the target before the start of your next turn, you can slide the target 1 square as a free action.

Chains of Affinity.name: Chains of Affinity
Chains of Affinity.flavor: You create a mental link with your foes so that when your allies take damage, your adversaries feel it.
Chains of Affinity.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. When any ally takes damage from an attack while within the zone, each enemy within the zone takes 5 psychic damage.

Temporal Acceleration.name: Temporal Acceleration
Temporal Acceleration.flavor: As you leap into battle, time accelerates in jumps, trying to catch up to you.
Temporal Acceleration.onHit: 4[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is slowed and cannot shift (save ends both).
Temporal Acceleration.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed and cannot shift until the end of your next turn.
Temporal Acceleration.effect: The attack creates a zone in a close burst 2. The zone lasts until the end of your next turn. Any enemy that starts its turn within the zone is slowed until the end of its next turn. Any ally that starts his or her turn within the zone gains a +2 power bonus to speed until the end of his or her next turn.
Temporal Acceleration.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Vitality Transfer.name: Vitality Transfer
Vitality Transfer.flavor: The pain your attack inflicts on your foe gives you strength to heal your comrades.
Vitality Transfer.onHit: 4[W] + Charisma modifier damage. Once before the end of the encounter, when the target starts its turn bloodied or drops to 0 hit points, each ally you can see regains hit points as if he or she had spent a healing surge.

Borrowed Time.name: Borrowed Time
Borrowed Time.flavor: You steal a bit of time and give it to the ally who can best use it.
Borrowed Time.effect: The target can use a free action to take a standard, a move, and a minor action.

Guided Opportunity.name: Guided Opportunity
Guided Opportunity.flavor: Your thoughts guide your ally’s attack so that it strikes true.
Guided Opportunity.trigger: An ally within 3 squares of you makes an opportunity attack
Guided Opportunity.target: The triggering ally in the burst
Guided Opportunity.effect: The target gains a power bonus to the attack roll and the damage roll equal to your Charisma modifier.

Flood of Madness.name: Flood of Madness
Flood of Madness.flavor: Your feint twists the mind of your foe so that it lashes out at its companion.
Flood of Madness.onHit: 1[W] + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target makes a melee basic attack as a free action against each of your enemies adjacent to it.

Revelatory Slash.name: Revelatory Slash
Revelatory Slash.flavor: Rather than attack, you open your mind’s eye and urge your allies to strike.
Revelatory Slash.target: One or two allies in the burst
Revelatory Slash.effect: Each target can make an at-will attack as a free action. If a target’s attack hits, he or she gains 15 temporary hit points.

Blistering Aversion.name: Blistering Aversion
Blistering Aversion.flavor: You convince your enemy and nearby foes that they are being burned alive.
Blistering Aversion.onHit: 3[W] + Charisma modifier fire damage, and ongoing 15 fire damage (save ends).
Blistering Aversion.effect: The attack creates a zone in a close burst 3. The zone lasts until the end of your next turn. Any enemy that ends its turn within the zone takes ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends).

Revealed Assets.name: Revealed Assets
Revealed Assets.flavor: Your attack clarifies your allies’ senses and helps your friends anticipate their enemies’ attacks.
Revealed Assets.effect: The attack creates a zone in a close burst 2. The zone lasts until the end of your next turn. While within the zone, allies gain a bonus to all defenses equal to the number of enemies within the zone.

Summons to Doom.name: Summons to Doom
Summons to Doom.flavor: You compel your enemies to approach to be punished.
Summons to Doom.onHit: You pull the target 4 squares, and it takes 4[W] + your Charisma modifier psychic damage. The enemy then chooses either to be pushed 3 squares or to take a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

Restorative Bastion.name: Restorative Bastion
Restorative Bastion.flavor: A successful strike with your weapon fills a nearby ally with new life.
Restorative Bastion.onHit: 4[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and each ally you can see can make a saving throw.

Unnerving Disruption.name: Unnerving Disruption
Unnerving Disruption.flavor: You confuse your enemy, throwing off its attacks.
Unnerving Disruption.onHit: 1[W] + Charisma modifier psychic damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target is weakened and takes a penalty to attack rolls. The penalty equals your Constitution modifier.
Unnerving Disruption.keyword: This power gains the Zone keyword.
Unnerving Disruption.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. While within the zone, allies gain a bonus to damage rolls equal to your Constitution modifier.

Empathic Projection.name: Empathic Projection
Empathic Projection.flavor: Your emotions flood the battlefield so that your allies feel your successes and know to compensate for your failures.
Empathic Projection.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Empathic Projection.onHit: 4[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and you push the target 2 squares.
Empathic Projection.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever you hit with an attack, allies within 3 squares of you gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn, and whenever you miss with an attack, allies within 3 squares of you gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

Undeniable Weakness.name: Undeniable Weakness
Undeniable Weakness.flavor: You impart sensations of frailty to your foes and of might to your friends.
Undeniable Weakness.onHit: 4[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is weakened (save ends).
Undeniable Weakness.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is weakened until the end of your next turn.
Undeniable Weakness.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of the encounter. While within the zone, your allies have resistance to all damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Ardent Eruption.name: Ardent Eruption
Ardent Eruption.flavor: Your pain bleeds from you in a wave, touching your allies and lending new ferocity to their attacks.
Ardent Eruption.trigger: You are bloodied by an attack
Ardent Eruption.effect:
The target gains a +2 bonus to his or her damage rolls until the start of your next turn.
Level 11: +4 bonus.
Level 21: +6 bonus.

Impetuous Ruin.name: Impetuous Ruin
Impetuous Ruin.flavor: Your strike hobbles your enemy’s impulsiveness, preventing it from reacting in the heat of combat.
Impetuous Ruin.onHit: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Karmic Bond.name: Karmic Bond
Karmic Bond.flavor: Your strike ensures the enemy reaps what it sows by forming a bond between it and the creature it attacks next.
Karmic Bond.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage. If the target hits with an attack before the start of your next turn, it takes extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier from each attack that hits it before the end of your next turn.

Part the Fog.name: Part the Fog
Part the Fog.flavor: Your attack clears the way for an ally to unleash fury against your foe.
Part the Fog.onHit: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage. The next ally within 5 squares of you to miss the target with an attack before the start of your next turn can reroll the attack roll.

Wave of Fatigue.name: Wave of Fatigue
Wave of Fatigue.flavor: A wave of lethargy follows your strike, hampering your foe’s ability to effectively counterattack.
Wave of Fatigue.target: Each creature you can see in the burst
Wave of Fatigue.onHit: As above, and the target takes a -2 penalty to opportunity attack rolls and damage rolls until the end of your next turn.
Wave of Fatigue.effect: Until the end of your next turn, enemies take a penalty to damage rolls equal to your Constitution modifier while adjacent to you, and any creature that starts its turn adjacent to you is slowed until the end of its turn.

Battle Flow.name: Battle Flow
Battle Flow.flavor: Your attack draws strength from a foe to fuel the movement of you and your allies.
Battle Flow.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and one ally you can see shifts 2 squares as a free action. In addition, whenever the target takes a move action, you or one ally you can see shifts 2 squares as an immediate reaction (save ends).
Battle Flow.onMiss: Half damage, and one ally you can see shifts 2 squares as a free action.

Foretaste of Death.name: Foretaste of Death
Foretaste of Death.flavor: Your attack causes a foe to be overcome with a vision of its own death, hindering its effectiveness in combat.
Foretaste of Death.effect: The target has visions of death (save ends). While under this effect, the target cannot gain combat advantage, cannot flank with its allies, and grants combat advantage.

Lingering Fury.name: Lingering Fury
Lingering Fury.flavor: You smash your enemy aside, leaving it shrouded in a lingering fury that grants power to your allies.
Lingering Fury.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you push the target 1 square.
Lingering Fury.effect: The target is affected by a lingering fury (save ends). While the target is affected by this lingering fury, allies gain a +1 power bonus to attack rolls and a +2 power bonus to damage rolls while adjacent to the target.

Recursive Emotions.name: Recursive Emotions
Recursive Emotions.flavor: Your foe’s attempt to shake off the emotional onslaught of your attack harms other enemies while it restores vigor to your allies.
Recursive Emotions.effect: The target takes ongoing 5 psychic damage (save ends). Whenever the target makes a saving throw against this effect, one enemy you can see takes psychic damage equal to your Wisdom or Constitution modifier, and one ally you can see regains the same number of hit points.

Close Wounds.name: Close Wounds
Close Wounds.flavor: Flesh knits, wounds stanch, and strength returns for a time.
Close Wounds.effect: The target gains temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

Dull Pain.name: Dull Pain
Dull Pain.flavor: You respond to an enemy’s attack by dampening your ally’s ability to feel pain.
Dull Pain.trigger: An ally within 5 squares of you takes damage from an attack
Dull Pain.effect: Reduce the damage the target would take by your Wisdom modifier. The target also gains a +2 power bonus to saving throws until the end of his or her next turn.

Healing Bond.name: Healing Bond
Healing Bond.flavor: You strengthen the bond between two allies, so that when one prospers, they both benefit.
Healing Bond.trigger: An ally within 5 squares of you spends a healing surge
Healing Bond.target: One ally other than the triggering ally
Healing Bond.effect: The target regains hit points as if he or she had spent a healing surge.

Psionic Charge.name: Psionic Charge
Psionic Charge.flavor: When your ally springs into motion, you channel psionic power to lend him or her additional strength and speed.
Psionic Charge.effect: When the target charges before the end of its next turn, it gains a +2 power bonus to speed and a power bonus to damage rolls equal to your Wisdom or Constitution modifier on the charge attack.

Cloud Mind.name: Cloud Mind
Cloud Mind.flavor: Your attack clouds a foe’s mind to let an ally slip past without fear of reprisal.
Cloud Mind.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, any ally more than 1 square away from the target has concealment against it.

Guarded Prison.name: Guarded Prison
Guarded Prison.flavor: You constrain the target’s mind, making it imagine walls on all sides each time it tries to move.
Guarded Prison.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage. If the target willingly moves or shifts before the start of your next turn, one ally adjacent to you or the target can make a basic attack against the target as an immediate interrupt.

Unsteadying Rebuke.name: Unsteadying Rebuke
Unsteadying Rebuke.flavor: Your enemy’s attack inspires a savage psionic rebuke, letting you shift the battlefield’s perspective in your favor.
Unsteadying Rebuke.trigger: An enemy targets you with a melee attack
Unsteadying Rebuke.onHit: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and you slide the target a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier. You then slide each enemy now adjacent to the target 1 square.
Unsteadying Rebuke.effect: You do not lose your standard action on your next turn.

Withered Technique.name: Withered Technique
Withered Technique.flavor: Your attack scours your enemy’s mind and instincts, hobbling its most potent attacks.
Withered Technique.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target deals half damage with any attack that is not a basic attack.

Decelerating Slash.name: Decelerating Slash
Decelerating Slash.flavor: When your strike lands, light flashes from you to drain away your enemy’s momentum.
Decelerating Slash.onHit: 3[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).
Decelerating Slash.firstFailedSavingThrow: The target is immobilized instead of slowed (save ends).
Decelerating Slash.eachFailedSavingThrow: One ally you can see shifts 1 square as a free action.

Invitation to Defeat.name: Invitation to Defeat
Invitation to Defeat.flavor: You raise your weapon and force your enemies to approach you, inviting them to certain defeat.
Invitation to Defeat.onHit: You pull the target 5 squares. Any target pulled to a square adjacent to you is weakened (save ends).
Invitation to Defeat.effect: Enemies are weakened while adjacent to you. In addition, the first time each turn that an enemy adjacent to you takes damage, that enemy takes extra psychic damage equal to your Charisma modifier. This effect lasts until the end of your next turn.
Invitation to Defeat.sustainMinor: The effect persists until the end of your next turn.

Meteoric Charge.name: Meteoric Charge
Meteoric Charge.flavor: Your attack provides allies with an emotional surge, setting up a series of furious charges against your foes.
Meteoric Charge.effect: Until the end of your next turn, any ally who starts his or her turn within 5 squares of you gains a +2 power bonus to charge attack rolls and a power bonus to charge damage rolls equal to your Charisma modifier.
Meteoric Charge.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack. If you do so, you gain a +1 power bonus to the attack roll.

Specter of Doubt.name: Specter of Doubt
Specter of Doubt.flavor: Your attack plants a seed of doubt in your enemy’s subconscious. As it grows, it infects other foes, robbing them of their will to fight.
Specter of Doubt.onHit: 1[W] + Charisma modifier psychic damage. Whenever the primary target makes an attack, it takes 10 psychic damage (save ends).
Specter of Doubt.onMiss: Whenever the primary target makes an attack, it takes 5 psychic damage (save ends).
Specter of Doubt.eachFailedSavingThrow: You can make the following secondary attack as a free action.
Specter of Doubt.secondaryTarget: One creature within 3 squares of the primary target
Specter of Doubt.secondaryOnHit: The secondary target is dazed (save ends).

Escalating Fury.name: Escalating Fury
Escalating Fury.flavor: Your pain girds allies against the threats looming on all sides.
Escalating Fury.trigger: You take damage from an attack
Escalating Fury.effect: The target gains temporary hit points equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

Opportunity Seized.name: Opportunity Seized
Opportunity Seized.flavor: When a foe slips past you or your ally, it opens up new opportunities to attack.
Opportunity Seized.trigger: You or one ally in the burst misses with an opportunity attack
Opportunity Seized.effect: The target makes another opportunity attack.

Rapid Calculation.name: Rapid Calculation
Rapid Calculation.flavor: You quickly assess the threat before you and help your allies to properly prepare for the fight.
Rapid Calculation.effect: You slide the target 3 squares, and the target gains a +2 power bonus to all defenses until it takes its first action during the encounter.

Shared Momentum.name: Shared Momentum
Shared Momentum.flavor: You link two allies with psionic energy, letting them match each other’s movements in battle.
Shared Momentum.trigger: An ally within 5 squares of you moves or shifts
Shared Momentum.target: One ally other than the triggering ally
Shared Momentum.effect: The target shifts a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Accelerated Maneuvers.name: Accelerated Maneuvers
Accelerated Maneuvers.flavor: You open your mind to your enemies’ intentions, using that knowledge to maneuver your allies into position.
Accelerated Maneuvers.effect: Until the end of your next turn, each ally who starts his or her turn within 5 squares of you gains a +2 power bonus to speed and can shift 2 squares as a move action.

Fatal Attraction.name: Fatal Attraction
Fatal Attraction.flavor: Your attack prevents an enemy from ignoring your presence on the battlefield.
Fatal Attraction.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and you mark the target until the end of your next turn. Until the end of your next turn, the target grants combat advantage to allies adjacent to you.

Stolen Strength.name: Stolen Strength
Stolen Strength.flavor: Your attack leaves a foe reeling, sapping its strength as it tries to fight back.
Stolen Strength.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target takes a penalty to damage rolls equal to your Constitution modifier.

Trailblazing Assault.name: Trailblazing Assault
Trailblazing Assault.flavor: Your attack opens up the battlefield, letting an ally surge forward to attack.
Trailblazing Assault.onHit: 1[W] modifier damage. One ally you can see charges with a power bonus to the attack roll equal to your Constitution modifier. If the ally hits with this attack, he or she gains a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the start of your next turn and can spend a healing surge.
Trailblazing Assault.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Cerebral Worm.name: Cerebral Worm
Cerebral Worm.flavor: Your attack lodges in your foe’s mind like a parasite, hindering its ability to attack.
Cerebral Worm.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target is affected by your cerebral worm (save ends). While the target is affected by the worm, the first time the target makes an attack roll on each of its turns, it must either take 10 psychic damage or make the attack roll twice and use the lower roll.
Cerebral Worm.onMiss: Half damage, and the target takes 10 damage the next time it makes an attack roll before the end of your next turn.

Emotional Wellspring.name: Emotional Wellspring
Emotional Wellspring.flavor: Your attack drains a foe of its resilience, and allows allies to claim that resilience for themselves.
Emotional Wellspring.effect: The target takes ongoing 5 psychic damage (save ends). In addition, each ally who hits the target can choose to gain temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier or make a saving throw with a +4 power bonus. This effect lasts until the end of your next turn, or until the target is no longer taking ongoing damage from this power, whichever is later.

Spatial Anomaly.name: Spatial Anomaly
Spatial Anomaly.flavor: Your focused thought punches a hole in reality, drawing your enemy into position for your allies’ attacks.
Spatial Anomaly.effect: You teleport the target 5 squares. One or two allies adjacent to the target at the end of the teleport can each make a melee basic attack against the target as a free action. Each ally who hits the target also gains temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

Spur the Battle.name: Spur the Battle
Spur the Battle.flavor: As you attack, mystical light shrouds your nearby allies, speeding them into battle.
Spur the Battle.effect: After the attack, each ally adjacent to you can shift 1 square or move his or her speed as a free action.

Force of Will.name: Force of Will
Force of Will.flavor: You throw off an affliction with such force that nearby allies are protected by your power.
Force of Will.trigger: You succeed on a saving throw
Force of Will.target: You and each ally in the burst
Force of Will.effect: The target gains a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

Fostered Talent.name: Fostered Talent
Fostered Talent.flavor: You draw strength from an ally’s accomplishment, then share that strength with other allies.
Fostered Talent.trigger: An ally you can see succeeds on a skill check
Fostered Talent.target: You and each ally in the burst other than the triggering ally
Fostered Talent.effect: The target gains a +2 power bonus to the next skill check he or she makes before the end of your next turn.

Psychic Boon.name: Psychic Boon
Psychic Boon.flavor: When an ally’s attack hits, you channel the rush of victory and return it as increased resilience.
Psychic Boon.trigger: An ally within 5 squares of you hits with a melee attack
Psychic Boon.target: The triggering ally in the burst
Psychic Boon.effect: The target gains temporary hit points equal to 5 + your Charisma modifier.

Vital Summons.name: Vital Summons
Vital Summons.flavor: When an ally is in trouble, you speed help to his or her side.
Vital Summons.trigger: An ally within 5 squares of you becomes bloodied or drops to 0 hit points or fewer
Vital Summons.target: One ally other than the triggering ally
Vital Summons.effect: You teleport the target to a square adjacent to the triggering ally.

Conflicted Emotions.name: Conflicted Emotions
Conflicted Emotions.flavor: Your attack leaves your enemy unable to tell friend from foe, wracking it with pain if it comes too close to another creature.
Conflicted Emotions.effect: Until the start of your next turn, any enemy that ends its turn adjacent to you takes 5 psychic damage and grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Essence Conduit.name: Essence Conduit
Essence Conduit.flavor: In pressing the attack, you steal a foe’s resolve and bestow it on an ally.
Essence Conduit.onHit: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage plus 1d8 psychic damage. One ally within 5 squares of you can spend a healing surge and regain additional hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.

Invert Defeat.name: Invert Defeat
Invert Defeat.flavor: The psychic energy you steal from a triumphant foe bolsters your allies as their own strength fades.
Invert Defeat.onHit: 3[W] + Charisma modifier damage. Until the start of your next turn, when an enemy you can see deals damage with an attack, one ally within 5 squares of you gains temporary hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Stack the Odds.name: Stack the Odds
Stack the Odds.flavor: Your quick strike grants your allies added strength.
Stack the Odds.onHit: 3[W] + Charisma modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, allies gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls while adjacent to you, and enemies take a -2 penalty to attack rolls while adjacent to you.

Aggressive Accompaniment.name: Aggressive Accompaniment
Aggressive Accompaniment.flavor: You flash across the battlefield to unleash a devastating attack in concert with an ally, then grant that ally increased fury against your common foe.
Aggressive Accompaniment.trigger: An ally within 10 squares of you makes a melee attack
Aggressive Accompaniment.effect: The triggering ally gains combat advantage against the target for its triggering attack, and deals 2d6 extra psychic damage with that attack.
Aggressive Accompaniment.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).

Bloody Resurgence.name: Bloody Resurgence
Bloody Resurgence.flavor: When you lash out with your weapon, an ally feels its strength replenished.
Bloody Resurgence.target: One enemy, or two enemies if you are bloodied
Bloody Resurgence.effect: When you make this attack, one ally who can see you can spend a healing surge. If you are bloodied, the ally regains additional hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

Coordinated Effort.name: Coordinated Effort
Coordinated Effort.flavor: You link minds with your allies, granting all of you the chance to act in concert before your foes can react.
Coordinated Effort.target: You and each ally you can see in the burst, to a maximum of five targets
Coordinated Effort.effect:
You apply one of the following effects to each target. Each effect can be used only once.
* The target flies a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier as a free action. The target must land at the end of this movement.
* The target shifts its speed as a free action.
* The target spends a healing surge.
* The target can make a basic attack as a free action.
* The target can charge as a free action.

Treachery's Seed.name: Treachery's Seed
Treachery's Seed.flavor: Your mind touches an enemy’s, planting a seed of treachery that lets you control it through its own attacks.
Treachery's Seed.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever the target hits with a melee attack, you can use an immediate reaction to force the target to make a melee basic attack against a target you choose.

Common Cause.name: Common Cause
Common Cause.flavor: An ally’s recovery lets you channel a temporary burst of resilience to other allies.
Common Cause.trigger: An ally within 10 squares of you spends a healing surge
Common Cause.effect: The target gains temporary hit points equal to 10 + your Charisma modifier.

Detach Mind.name: Detach Mind
Detach Mind.flavor: You reach into your subject’s mind to provide a temporary respite from a debilitating condition.
Detach Mind.effect: Choose one effect on the target that a save can end. The target is not affected by that effect until the end of its next turn, but it cannot make a saving throw against that effect at the end of that turn. The target gains a +2 power bonus to his or her next saving throw to end that effect.

Disbelieve Danger.name: Disbelieve Danger
Disbelieve Danger.flavor: With a thought, you cause an ally under attack to take on a spectral form that protects against additional harm.
Disbelieve Danger.trigger: An ally within 10 squares of you is hit by an attack
Disbelieve Danger.effect: The target is insubstantial until the end of his or her next turn.

Resilient Bond.name: Resilient Bond
Resilient Bond.flavor: The bond you forge with an ally ensures that you both make it to the battle’s end.
Resilient Bond.effect: Each target gains regeneration 5 until the end of the encounter. If a target starts its turn more than 5 squares away from the other target, this regeneration does not function for the target during that turn.

Blinding Clarity.name: Blinding Clarity
Blinding Clarity.flavor: Your attack overwhelms your foe, hindering its ability to take advantage of opportunities in combat.
Blinding Clarity.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.

Emotional Flood.name: Emotional Flood
Emotional Flood.flavor: Your attack releases emotion that grants vigor to your allies.
Emotional Flood.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Emotional Flood.effect: Each ally adjacent to you gains temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier + 5 for each enemy you hit with this attack.

Probability Flux.name: Probability Flux
Probability Flux.flavor: Your strike alters the laws of chance, denying good fortune to the enemy.
Probability Flux.onHit: 3[W] + Charisma modifier damage. Critical hits scored against any ally within 5 squares of you before the end of your next turn is treated as a normal hit. In addition, when an enemy within 5 squares of you succeeds on a saving throw, each ally within 5 squares of you can make a saving throw with a bonus equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Violent Upsurge.name: Violent Upsurge
Violent Upsurge.flavor: You smash your enemy with such force that it is left vulnerable to follow-up attacks.
Violent Upsurge.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target gains vulnerable 2 to all damage until the end of your next turn. This vulnerability increases by 2 whenever an attack hits or misses the target.

Clarified Pain.name: Clarified Pain
Clarified Pain.flavor: The pain your enemy feels from your assault lets you strengthen your allies’ attacks.
Clarified Pain.onHit: 3[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and ongoing 10 psychic damage (save ends).
Clarified Pain.effect: Whenever the target makes a saving throw to end the ongoing psychic damage from this attack, one ally within 5 squares of you gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls until the end of his or her next turn.

Corridor of Pain.name: Corridor of Pain
Corridor of Pain.flavor: The power of your devastating strike resonates within a foe, letting you continually fling it into optimal position for your allies to attack.
Corridor of Pain.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage. You slide the target 5 squares, and it is restrained (save ends).
Corridor of Pain.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever the target takes damage from an attack, you teleport the target 5 squares to a destination adjacent to at least one of your allies.

Mind Rend.name: Mind Rend
Mind Rend.flavor: Your attack generates a field of psionic energy that tears away your enemies’ will to act.
Mind Rend.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).
Mind Rend.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).
Mind Rend.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. Any enemy that ends its turn within the zone is dazed until the end of its next turn.
Mind Rend.sustainMinor: The zone persists until the end of your next turn.

Reactive Jaunt Strike.name: Reactive Jaunt Strike
Reactive Jaunt Strike.flavor: When you strike your foe, your expanded awareness lets you leap to the side of an ally in danger.
Reactive Jaunt Strike.effect: You enter the reactive jaunt stance. Until the stance ends, whenever an ally within 5 squares of you becomes bloodied by an attack or drops to 0 hit points or fewer, you teleport to an unoccupied square adjacent to that ally and can make a melee basic attack as an immediate reaction.

Awakened Id.name: Awakened Id
Awakened Id.flavor: You call forth your ally’s innate combat instincts to turn the tide of battle.
Awakened Id.effect: Until the end of the encounter, while the target is bloodied, he or she gains a +1 bonus to speed, a +5 power bonus to Athletics checks and Endurance checks, and deals 5 extra psychic damage with melee attacks.

Empathic Recovery.name: Empathic Recovery
Empathic Recovery.flavor: Your ally’s disappointment helps you recover your expended energy.
Empathic Recovery.trigger: An ally within 10 squares of you misses with an encounter attack power

Expedite Healing.name: Expedite Healing
Expedite Healing.flavor: Your psionic connection to an ally who falls in combat allows him or her to get back in the fight quickly.
Expedite Healing.trigger: An ally within 10 squares of you drops to 0 hit points or fewer
Expedite Healing.effect: The target regains hit points as if he or she had spent a healing surge, and can stand up and shift a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier as a free action.

Sudden Reinforcements.name: Sudden Reinforcements
Sudden Reinforcements.flavor: You see an ally in danger and dispatch a waiting ally to help.
Sudden Reinforcements.trigger: An enemy within 10 squares of you hits an ally with a melee attack
Sudden Reinforcements.effect: The target teleports to an unoccupied square adjacent to the triggering enemy and gains combat advantage against that enemy until the end of the target’s next turn.

Concerted Strike.name: Concerted Strike
Concerted Strike.flavor: Your straightforward weapon attack inspires your allies to follow your lead.
Concerted Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage. One or two allies within 5 squares of you can each make a basic attack as a free action, with a power bonus to the attack roll equal to your Constitution modifier. Each ally makes its attack against a different target that is not the target of this power.

Restorative Smash.name: Restorative Smash
Restorative Smash.flavor: The elation you feel from a successful attack fills a nearby ally with renewed vigor.
Restorative Smash.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.
Restorative Smash.effect: Until the end of your next turn, any ally who hits an enemy with an attack while adjacent to you can spend a healing surge and regain additional hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Ruinous Scream.name: Ruinous Scream
Ruinous Scream.flavor: Your weapon attack unleashes a thunderous psionic scream that rattles your foes.
Ruinous Scream.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and you slide the target 5 squares. At the end of the slide, each enemy adjacent to the target takes 10 thunder damage, and each ally adjacent to you or the target gains temporary hit points equal to 5 + your Wisdom modifier.

Bountiful Portent.name: Bountiful Portent
Bountiful Portent.flavor: When a chosen foe falls, you and your allies can restore yourselves with its strength.
Bountiful Portent.effect: When the target drops to 0 hit points, you and each ally within 5 squares of it regain hit points as if each of you had spent a healing surge.

Inverted Emotions.name: Inverted Emotions
Inverted Emotions.flavor: Your attack corrupts the target’s emotions, bestowing pain from its triumphs and increasing the scope of its failure.
Inverted Emotions.effect: The target is affected by inverted emotions (save ends). While the target is affected by inverted emotions, the first time on each of its turns that it hits with a melee or a ranged attack, one enemy you choose adjacent to it takes 10 psychic damage. When the target misses with an attack, it grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.
Inverted Emotions.aftereffect: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Outpouring of Grief.name: Outpouring of Grief
Outpouring of Grief.flavor: You channel psionic power through your foe, letting you turn one ally’s pain into another’s healing.
Outpouring of Grief.effect: Until the target drops to 0 hit points, when an ally becomes bloodied by an attack while you are within 5 squares of the target, another ally adjacent to you or the target can spend a healing surge.

Victorious Vision.name: Victorious Vision
Victorious Vision.flavor: You channel the emotion of victory to your allies, a confidence that lets them lash out at your foes.
Victorious Vision.target: One or two allies in the burst
Victorious Vision.effect: The target can make a basic attack against an enemy as a free action. If the attack hits, the enemy takes 5 extra psychic damage and is also dazed (save ends). If the attack misses, the enemy takes 15 psychic damage and the target slides the enemy 1 square.

Falling Sky.name: Falling Sky
Falling Sky.flavor: Your attack fills an enemy with a momentary sensation of vertigo that leaves it reeling.
Falling Sky.onHit: 4[W] + Charisma modifier damage. The target chooses either to be immobilized until the end of your next turn or to grant combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Tactical Failure.name: Tactical Failure
Tactical Failure.flavor: When you strike, you prevent your foe from responding with its most potent attacks.
Tactical Failure.onHit: 4[W] + Charisma modifier damage. The target is dazed until the end of your next turn or until it takes damage from an attack.

Unconscious Assault.name: Unconscious Assault
Unconscious Assault.flavor: You take control of a foe’s unconscious impulses, forcing it to attack at your whim.
Unconscious Assault.effect: The target charges an enemy you choose as a free action. If this attack hits, the target takes 10 psychic damage and the creature it charged takes 10 extra psychic damage.

Explosive Summons.name: Explosive Summons
Explosive Summons.flavor: You are drawn to the side of an ally under attack, unleashing a potent blast of psychic energy against your foes.
Explosive Summons.trigger: An ally you can see is hit by an attack
Explosive Summons.effect: Before the attack, you teleport to an unoccupied square adjacent to the triggering ally.
Explosive Summons.onHit: 3[W] + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you push the target 5 squares.
Explosive Summons.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square.

Lethal Delusion.name: Lethal Delusion
Lethal Delusion.flavor: Your vicious attack leaves a foe convinced of its own imminent failure, crippling it in combat.
Lethal Delusion.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is affected by a lethal delusion (save ends). While the target is affected by the delusion, it takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls, defenses, and saving throws. In addition, the first time the target misses with an attack during each of its turns, it takes 10 psychic damage.

Vulnerability Revealed.name: Vulnerability Revealed
Vulnerability Revealed.flavor: A red corona flares around you, highlighting the vulnerability of nearby foes even as it grants power to your allies.
Vulnerability Revealed.effect: Until the end of the encounter, bloodied enemies grant combat advantage to your allies while adjacent to you, and allies gain a power bonus to damage rolls equal to your Charisma modifier for attacks against enemies adjacent to you.

Intent Laid Bare.name: Intent Laid Bare
Intent Laid Bare.flavor: You slip into your opponent’s mind while the pain from your attack distracts it.
Intent Laid Bare.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target cannot shift until the end of your next turn.
Intent Laid Bare.effect: As above, and until the end of your next turn, if the target moves, you or one ally within 5 squares of you can shift 1 square as a free action.
Intent Laid Bare.special: You can use this power unaugmented as a melee basic attack.

Sympathetic Agony.name: Sympathetic Agony
Sympathetic Agony.flavor: You open your mind to receive an ally’s agony, and take some of that pain upon yourself
Sympathetic Agony.trigger: An ally within 5 squares of you takes damage from an attack.
Sympathetic Agony.effect: The target takes half damage from the triggering attack. If the target would receive an effect that a save can end from the triggering attack, you can choose to have the effect apply to you instead. Until the end of your next turn, you and the target gain a +2 power bonus to defenses while you are within 5 squares of one another.

Painful Revelations.name: Painful Revelations
Painful Revelations.flavor: You risk your sanity to share your enemy’s pain, and in doing so gain powerful insights into how to bring this battle to a close.
Painful Revelations.effect: You activate an aura 5 that lasts until the end of the encounter or until you dismiss it as a minor action. Whenever an enemy in the aura takes damage from an attack, you can take 5 psychic damage that can’t be reduced in any way. If you do so, that enemy grants combat advantage (save ends).

Clarifying Impact.name: Clarifying Impact
Clarifying Impact.flavor: Smashing your weapon into the enemy heightens your mind’s ability to pick out concealed and hidden foes.
Clarifying Impact.attack: Charisma vs. AC. If the target is adjacent to one of your allies, you have combat advantage for this attack.
Clarifying Impact.effect: You activate an aura 5 that lasts until the end of your next turn. Enemies in the aura cannot benefit from partial cover or partial concealment.
Clarifying Impact.special: You can use this power unaugmented as a melee basic attack.

Unshakable Bond.name: Unshakable Bond
Unshakable Bond.flavor: When your enemy lets down its guard after making a successful attack, you invade its mind and steal its thoughts.
Unshakable Bond.trigger: An enemy hits your ally with an attack.
Unshakable Bond.effect: You subject the target to your unshakable bond until the end of the encounter or until it drops to 0 hit points. While the target is subject to your unshakable bond, you always know its exact location and your attacks against it ignore any cover or concealment.
